problem.title: Sharing Document Insights is Complicated
problem.description: You summarize a key document. Now you need to share it with your team. Email? Slack? Google Doc? Everyone has questions. Context gets lost. Collaboration is a mess.
painPoints: No central place for team document insights
Team members ask same questions repeatedly
Version control nightmare with multiple editors
No way to track who read what

solution.title: Collaborate on Summaries in One Workspace
solution.description: SummarizePDF Team workspaces let your entire team access document summaries, add comments, ask questions, and collaborate on insights - all in one place.

steps.title: Create Team Workspace

steps.title: Share Documents & Summaries

steps.title: Comment & Collaborate

steps.title: Track Engagement

faq.question: How many team members can I add?
faq.answer: Team plan ($49/mo) includes up to 10 users. Need more? Contact sales for custom enterprise pricing with unlimited users.

faq.question: Can I control who sees what documents?
faq.answer: Yes! Set permissions per document or folder. Choose who can view, comment, or edit each summary.

faq.question: Does everyone need their own account?
faq.answer: Yes, but it's included! Team plan price covers up to 10 user accounts. Everyone gets their own login.

faq.question: Can external people view summaries?
faq.answer: Yes. Generate shareable links for specific summaries. Recipients don't need accounts to view shared summaries.

faq.question: Is there a team activity feed?
faq.answer: Yes! See recent activity: who uploaded documents, who commented, who asked questions. Keep everyone in sync.

faq.question: Can I migrate from individual to team plan?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Upgrade anytime and invite team members. All your existing documents and summaries transfer automatically.
